pageDesc: We are very happy that brands like La Scintilla, whose trademarks are refinement, elegance and striving for the best, have seen us as an agency with which they have something in common. We translated our common vision and aspirations into successful cooperation!
text1: Each of these cakes can be found on a movie set about the life of people in old courts. They are La Scintilla patisserie. And we had the task of presenting their treats in the digital world. And to do it in a way so that we create that aristocratic impression that befits this brand.
metaDesc: A project we are proud of - La Scintilla, which combines art and cuisine into the most beautiful sweets you've ever tasted.
